info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER...BRONX AND NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 200 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverdale, or over East Tremont, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, New Rochelle, Mott Haven, East Tremont, Riverdale, Bronxville, Mount Vernon, Eastchester, Hastings-on-Hudson, Pelham, Woodlawn, Tuckahoe, Pelham Manor, Washington Heights, and Fordham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
